Why? ::: ## {{< fa circle-question >}} {.center-align auto-animate="true"} ::: {style="margin-top: 50px; font-size: 1.5em"} What do you think is the best invention of our existence? ::: ## {{< fa circle-question >}} {.center-align auto-animate="true"} ::: {style="margin-top: 50px; font-size: 1.5em"} Something that nobody teaches you, but that everyone should learn. ::: # Getting to know each other - Round of personal introductions ## {{< fa handshake-simple >}} {auto-animate="true"} ::: task - [Past]{.highlight-peach}: How did you end up caring about data and WASH? - [Present]{.highlight-peach}: What are you working on right now? - [Future]{.highlight-peach}: What are you hoping to do in the future? - [You]{.highlight-peach}: Add a personal note about yourself, if you like. ::: hand Think & take notes for 2 minutes, then share for 1 minute ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: # Getting to know each other - Brief overview of GHE # Getting to know each other - Introduction to WASHWeb vision & working groups

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
